name: Cheats Ultimate for Playstation 4 Games - Including Complete Walkthroughs
name_original: Cheats Ultimate for Playstation 4 Games - Including Complete Walkthroughs
description:
Cheats & Walkthroughs for the top Playstation 4 titles! With cheats, codes and COMPLETE walkthroughs. Also included is a basic cheats section covering every PS3 game! New games are added on a regular basis as well!

This mega app is packed full of cheats for the top PS4 titles. These cheats are hand picked and found from genuine gamers. We find every cheat to help you get through every story and annihilate every foe. Master every game inside and out!

Cheats for the games can include: cheat codes, glitches, unlockables, walkthroughs, multiplayer guides, unlock codes, achievement guides... etc.

Send in your game requests, cheats or any feedback to support@schroederdev.com.

Many guides are free. Others use in-app purchasing, giving the quality of paid guides, without downloading a ton of different reference applications and having the hassle of managing icons spread across your homescreen.

Download now! The base app is FREE!!
